title: How Social Media Is Reshaping Our Understanding Of Conflict And How It Is Blinding Us
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Technology - Today 
A look at how live tweeting of modern conflict gives us an unprecedented view of war but may only capture one side of hostilities...
